items.text: yorker at off stump, jammed back to the bowler
items.postText: Richard Foulkes: "It could be over quickly once (if!) Guptill gets his 100"
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: bouncer at a middle stump line. Ducks to let it pass
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: length and slanted in outside off. Looks to drive on the up, gets an inside edge to midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: yorker down leg side, can't get bat on it
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, 1 wide

items.text: short of a length outside off, hurried on the pull as he jumps onto the front foot. Off the inside half to midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: connects this time. Nothing pretty about this. Short of a length on off stump. Walks out, gets the front leg across and hoicks into the square leg boundary
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: length on leg stump, flicked to deep square
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: easy. He's bowling around the wicket with a leg side field. But he slings this full and very wide outside off. Massive gap between extra cover and backward point. Taylor taps it through there
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: yorker on middle stump, jammed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: length on middle stump, flicked to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, no run

items.text: length on leg stump, whipped to deep square off the back foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: slashed straight to sweeper cover. That was sweetly hit. Length ball with some width and he lunged into it with a flat-bat, on the up
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: short of a length outside off, chopped to third man's right
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, 2 runs

items.text: full and in at leg stump, flicked straight to midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: swatted away. Short and up outside off. Jumps up after a forward press and gets this pull onto the ground and past midwcket
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: low full toss on middle stump, nudged to mid-on's right with a closed face
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: yorker just outside off, chopped to point on the bounce
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Guptill, no run

items.text: short of a length on leg stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: full on off, driven to long-off
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: short and wide outside. Late cut, can't get past Tamim's slide to the right
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: century No. 15 for Guptill, brought up with a drive to long-off. Full ball outside off, leans in nicely and gets it past the bowler. His second against Bangladesh. And his first score of greater than 20 since his last hundred, seven ODIs ago. Gets out of that slump
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: short, down leg side, stands tall and swats it to the long leg boundary. As if you could do anything else with that
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: length at off stump, defended into the off side
items.postText:
Darren: "great to see guptill. back in the runs "

Ashis : "Injury of Shakib has made BD bowling look like a club team's attack especially when there are two RHB in the middle...everyone can easily feel the importance of Shakib."
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.text: short and wide and slanted across him. Looks for the upper cut but is beaten
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Guptill, no run
